Segment.name: SPI
Segment.comment: To provide a description of the included specification or technical data items

Field.name: SecurityLevelCode1
Field.comment: Code indicating the level of confidentiality assigned by the sender to the information following

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: EntityPurpose
Field.comment: The reason for the existence of the data item specified by the electronic data item independent of its presence in an EDI transaction

Field.name: EntityStatusCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the current status of the data item specified by the electronic data item

Field.name: TransactionSetPurposeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying purpose of transaction set

Field.name: ReportTypeCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the title or contents of a document, report or supporting item

Field.name: SecurityLevelCode2
Field.comment: Code indicating the level of confidentiality assigned by the sender to the information following

Field.name: AgencyQualifierCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the agency assigning the code values

Field.name: SourceSubqualifier
Field.comment: A reference that indicates the table or text maintained by the Source Qualifier

Field.name: AssignedNumber
Field.comment: Number assigned for differentiation within a transaction set

Field.name: CertificationTypeCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the type of certification

Field.name: ProposalDataDetailIdentifierCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the basis of a cited value in a proposal

Field.name: HierarchicalStructureCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the hierarchical application structure of a transaction set that utilizes the HL segment to define the structure of the transaction set

SyntaxNote.name: P0203
SyntaxNote.comment: If either SPI02 or SPI03 is present, then the other is required.
